item.title: Landlord Registration
item.description: Tool built in Vue for landlords to register their South Bend properties and property managers. Links Live Version More About the Initiative

item.title: Landlord Registration Redesign Proposal
item.description: As a part of an overall initiative to improve the UI and UX of the City of South Bend’s Landlord Registration web application, I created wireframes in Figma showing what a potential redesign of the site may look like - these are highly subject to change currently. Links Google Drive folder containing select wireframes More About the Initiative

item.title: Personal Site Redesign (WIP)
item.description: A redesign of my personal site that is a work in progress. The site will be built in Nuxt.js and will use primarily plain CSS for styling. Links More screenshots of the HTML/CSS mockup

item.title: blob
item.description: A simple walking simulator made in GB Studio to demonstrate the usefulness of GBS for making bitsy-like games with fewer limitations. Links Play the game on itch.io GitHub Link Assets

item.title: RE:Pear
item.description: Game made for Global Game Jam 2020 and a lesson in chosing your tools correctly and scoping. Links Godot Version GBStudio Version Assets

item.title: Running Ball
item.description: A simple game created in Unity where the player controls a ball in order to get it from one side of an obstacle course to another before time runs out. Links Game download

item.title: Sonifying Asian Pottery Data
item.description: Sonification is a technique that can be used to explore data through the mapping of data parameters to sound parameters. It can be used to explore data in an experimental way that may reveal aspects of the data that are not obvious when looking at a visualization. Here, I used Max/MSP to create a sonification of Asian pottery data. Links If you want to learn more about this project, check out the links below:
